mapper.select:
SELECT Z1.CODE_HEADER_UUID as codeHeaderUuid, Z1.CATEGORY_CODE as categoryCode, Z1.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, Z1.CODE_TYPE_UUID as codeTypeUuid, Z1.ORDER_METHOD_UUID as orderMethodUuid, Z1.SERVICE_UUID as serviceUuid, Z1.DESCRIPTION as description, Z1.NOTES as notes, Z1.USE_YN as useYN, Z2.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute01Code, Z2.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute01Str, Z2.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute01, Z3.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute02Code, Z3.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute02Str, Z3.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute02, Z4.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute03Code, Z4.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute03Str, Z4.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute03, Z5.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute04Code, Z5.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute04Str, Z5.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute04, Z6.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute05Code, Z6.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute05Str, Z6.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute05, Z7.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute06Code, Z7.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute06Str, Z7.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute06, Z8.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute07Code, Z8.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute07Str, Z8.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute07, Z9.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute08Code, Z9.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute08Str, Z9.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute08, Z10.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute09Code, Z10.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute09Str, Z10.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute09, Z11.CATEGORY_CODE as attribute10Code, Z11.CATEGORY_NAME as attribute10Str, Z11.CODE_HEADER_UUID as attribute10,
as insertUuid,
Z1.INSERT_DATE as insertDate,
as updateUuid,
Z1.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM AD_CODE_HEADER Z1, AD_CODE_HEADER Z2, AD_CODE_HEADER Z3, AD_CODE_HEADER Z4, AD_CODE_HEADER Z5, AD_CODE_HEADER Z6, AD_CODE_HEADER Z7, AD_CODE_HEADER Z8, AD_CODE_HEADER Z9, AD_CODE_HEADER Z10, AD_CODE_HEADER Z11
Z1.ATTRIBUTE01 = Z2.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE02 = Z3.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE03 = Z4.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE04 = Z5.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE05 = Z6.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE06 = Z7.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE07 = Z8.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE08 = Z9.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE09 = Z10.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE10 = Z11.CODE_HEADER_UUID(+)
AND Z1.CATEGORY_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{categoryCode} || '%'
AND Z1.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{categoryName} || '%'
AND Z1.SERVICE_UUID = #{serviceUuid}
AND Z1.CODE_TYPE_UUID = #{codeTypeUuid}
AND Z1.USE_YN = #{useYN}
ORDER BY Z1.CATEGORY_CODE

SELECT Z1.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as codeDetailUuid, Z1.CODE as code, Z1.CODE_NAME as codeName, Z1.DEFAULT_YN as defaultYN, Z1.ORDER_NO as orderNo, Z1.CODE_HEADER_UUID as codeHeaderUuid, Z1.DESCRIPTION as description, Z1.NOTES as notes, Z1.USE_YN as useYN, Z2.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute01, Z2.CODE_NAME as attribute01Str, Z2."CODE" as attribute01Code, Z3.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute02, Z3.CODE_NAME as attribute02Str, Z3."CODE" as attribute02Code, Z4.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute03, Z4.CODE_NAME as attribute03Str, Z4."CODE" as attribute03Code, Z5.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute04, Z5.CODE_NAME as attribute04Str, Z5."CODE" as attribute04Code, Z6.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute05, Z6.CODE_NAME as attribute05Str, Z6."CODE" as attribute05Code, Z7.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute06, Z7.CODE_NAME as attribute06Str, Z7."CODE" as attribute06Code, Z8.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute07, Z8.CODE_NAME as attribute07Str, Z8."CODE" as attribute07Code, Z9.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute08, Z9.CODE_NAME as attribute08Str, Z9."CODE" as attribute08Code, Z10.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute09, Z10.CODE_NAME as attribute09Str, Z10."CODE" as attribute09Code, Z11.CODE_DETAIL_UUID as attribute10, Z11.CODE_NAME as attribute10Str, Z11."CODE" as attribute10Code,
as insertUuid, Z1.INSERT_DATE as insertDate,
as updateUuid,
Z1.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM AD_CODE_DETAIL Z1, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z2, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z3, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z4, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z5, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z6, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z7, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z8, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z9, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z10, AD_CODE_DETAIL Z11 WHERE Z1.CODE_HEADER_UUID = #{codeHeaderUuid} AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE01 = Z2.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE02 = Z3.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE03 = Z4.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE04 = Z5.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE05 = Z6.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE06 = Z7.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE07 = Z8.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE08 = Z9.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE09 = Z10.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) AND Z1.ATTRIBUTE10 = Z11.CODE_DETAIL_UUID(+) ORDER BY Z1.ORDER_NO, Z1.CODE ASC
